overview: BrowserStack is a cloud platform for testing websites and mobile apps on real browsers, devices and operating systems. Teams can run manual and automated tests without maintaining their own device lab.
who_is_it_for: Software developers, QA engineers, product and testing teams who need to test websites and apps across many browsers and real mobile devices.
what_we_do: We provide instant access to thousands of real browsers and devices in the cloud so you can test your websites and apps for bugs, responsiveness, performance and compatibility.
pricing_basics: BrowserStack offers multiple products like Live for manual testing and App Live for mobile app testing, with plans starting around $39 per month for individual live testing and higher tiers for teams and automation. There is also a free trial so you can try the platform before paying.
free_tier: BrowserStack offers a time-limited free trial so you can test the platform, and has special free access for open source projects.

faq.a: BrowserStack lets you test websites and mobile apps on real browsers and devices in the cloud, so you can catch bugs and layout issues without maintaining your own device lab.
It is built for developers, QA engineers and testing teams who need reliable cross-browser and real-device testing.

faq.q: Do you have a free tier?
faq.a: Yes. We provide a free trial so you can experience the platform before choosing a paid plan, and we have special free access for open source projects.

Pricing depends on the product and number of users. Individual Live plans start around $39 per month, with higher-tier plans for teams, mobile apps and automation. For exact pricing we usually recommend checking the pricing page or talking to sales.
